root.message: The DATA_SOURCE field for indicator 16-2-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: Ministry of Interior (MINT), through the National Criminal Investigation Service (SERNIC) and General Command of the Police of the Republic of Mozambique (CGPRM)
Ministério do Interior (MINT), através do Serviço Nacional de Investigação Criminal (SERNIC) e Comando Geral da Polícia da República de Moçambique (CGPRM)
